alert.note: Alert for Becker; Beltrami; Clearwater; Hubbard; Mahnomen; Otter Tail; Polk; Wadena (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 10 at 9:32AM CDT until July 10 at 10:30AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Hubbard County in north central Minnesota... Wadena County in central Minnesota... Southeastern Polk County in northwestern Minnesota... Northeastern Otter Tail County in west central Minnesota... South central Beltrami County in north central Minnesota... Mahnomen County in northwestern Minnesota... Becker County in northwestern Minnesota... Southern Clearwater County in northwestern Minnesota... * Until 1030 AM CDT. * At 932 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Lengby to White Earth Nation to near Big McDonald Lake, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Many Point Lake and Pine Bend around 935 AM CDT. Ebro, Pine Point and Ponsford around 940 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Bagley, Perham, Richville, Two Inlets and Shevlin. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Becker; Beltrami; Clearwater; Hubbard; Mahnomen; Otter Tail; Polk; Wadena
